entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 then northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
